channel.title: Emulous Npc Damage
channel.description:
How do I change how hard the Npc's hit on Emulous 1.7?
A level 38 monster does not hit for a 54, lol. I've tried searching for an answer and I have come up empty-handed.
I took a look at the spawn-config.cfg file & I tried adding a White Wolf Npc into the server exactly how it says in the file itself. Well.. If you hit a 0 in the Npc, it dies.
But if I spawn the White Wolf in-game with the :: spawn command, it works fine except that the Npc can rape me!

item.title: Emulous Npc Damage
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

How do I change how hard the Npc’s hit on Emulous 1.7?

A level 38 monster does not hit for a 54, lol. I’ve tried searching for an answer and I have come up empty-handed.

I took a look at the spawn-config.cfg file & I tried adding a White Wolf Npc into the server exactly how it says in the file itself. Well… If you hit a 0 in the Npc, it dies.

But if I spawn the White Wolf in-game with the :: spawn command, it works fine except that the Npc can rape me!
